column4: hi, i am thinking using ubuntu for my mom.  i have been a long time RH user.  How long does an ubuntu release before it looses support?
18 months for the october release. the march 2006 release will have three years support
thanks guys, I will look at that webpage.
support means release of security patches, i believe -- i presume that is what you mean
yes. security patches.  I will be out of the country.  So I will be patching remotely.
